original_text: Then Moses used the blood in the bowls to splash on the people. He said, ‘This blood shows that you accept the covenant that the Lord has made with you. You agree to obey the rules of his covenant.’
korean_text: 모세가 그 피를 가지고 백성에게 뿌리며 이르되 이는 여호와께서 이 모든 말씀에 대하여 너희와 세우신 언약의 피니라

sentences.original_text: Then Moses used the blood in the bowls
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세가 대접에 있는 피를 사용하여

sentences.original_text: This blood shows that you accept the covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 이 피는 당신이 언약을 받아들였음을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has made with you
You agree to obey the rules
